title: Eiger Adventure
overview:
Eiger Adventure is a premier mobile application designed to enhance the outdoor experience by providing a seamless shopping platform for adventure enthusiasts. The app offers a wide range of high-quality outdoor gear, including apparel and equipment tailored for activities such as camping, hiking, traveling, and riding.

With a user-friendly interface, Eiger Adventure enables customers to explore products effortlessly, shop based on their preferred activities, and stay connected with official Eiger stores. The app also provides exclusive benefits for members of the Eiger Adventure Club, including special promotions and free shipping across Indonesia.

By integrating modern e-commerce features with a passion for outdoor adventure, Eiger Adventure ensures that every journey is well-equipped and more enjoyable.
key_features: Eiger Adventure Club membership perks (discounts & free shipping)
Store locator with Google Maps integration
challenges_solutions: Performance Optimization: Reduced frame drops by implementing lazy loading for product images and optimizing API calls.
AI-Powered Recommendations: Integrated TensorFlow models to enhance product recommendations based on user behavior.
Scalability: Used NestJS and Firebase for a flexible and scalable backend architecture.
my_role: Led the mobile development using Flutter, ensuring a smooth UI/UX experience.
Integrated AI-based product recommendations.
Collaborated with backend engineers to optimize API performance.
Ensured clean and maintainable code using best practices.

impact_metrics.text: Ranked Top 50 in the Shopping category

future_plans: Implement an augmented reality (AR) feature for virtual product try-ons
Improve AI recommendations using user engagement data
Expand the loyalty program with gamification features
description: With the remarkable success of the Eiger Adventure project, Eiger Indonesia has strengthened its partnership with RollingGlory, collaborating on various events and expanding its initiatives. This strategic collaboration has led to the development of new projects aimed at enhancing the outdoor experience, delivering innovative solutions, and reaching a broader audience. Through this partnership, both companies continue to push boundaries, ensuring that adventure enthusiasts receive high-quality products and services tailored to their needs. $!Building on this strong collaboration, Eiger Indonesia continues to trust RollingGlory as a key development partner, awarding five new projects to further elevate its digital and retail experiences. These projects aim to enhance user engagement, streamline operations, and introduce innovative features that align with Eiger's commitment to adventure and exploration. With this continued partnership, both companies are set to create cutting-edge solutions that redefine the outdoor industry and deliver exceptional value to their customers.$!One of these exciting new projects is Eiger Adventure Land, a groundbreaking initiative designed to bring the spirit of adventure to life. This project aims to create an immersive experience that blends technology with outdoor exploration, offering adventure enthusiasts a unique way to engage with the Eiger brand. Through this collaboration, RollingGlory is leveraging its expertise to develop innovative digital solutions that enhance user interaction, making Eiger Adventure Land a key milestone in Eiger Indonesiaâ€™s journey to inspire and connect with its community.$!
captions: Eiger Indonesia And Rolling Glory Collaboration
Jason Wuysang (Eiger's Marketing General Manager) and Brian Al Bahr (Rolling Glory's CEO) at Eiger Pasific Media Conference 2024
